text:
On another note, I noticed today that on all my HTML + HubL templates the default Google Font I set for the theme using the theme options gets loaded 6 times: <https://d.pr/i/sVsdY0>
The style components underneath each of them are realted to the CTA's I have on the page.
I have more than 1 option in Theme Options were I can set the font for different things, apart from the global one.

Any idea where this might be coming from? It doesn't look like normal functionality
